liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Encapsulates MS-SQL database support.

Definition at line 16 of file MSSQLDatabase.java.

String liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.getProductName (  ) 

Returns the full database product name.

May be different than what the JDBC connection reports (getDatabaseProductName())

String liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.getTypeName (  ) 

Returns an all-lower-case short name of the product.

Used for end-user selecting of database type such as the DBMS precondition.

String liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.getDefaultDriver ( String  url  ) 

If this database understands the given url, return the default driver class name.

Otherwise return null.

String liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.escapeTableName ( String  schemaName,
String  tableName 
)

Escapes the table name in a database-dependent manner so reserved words can be used as a table name (i.e.

"order"). Currently only escapes MS-SQL because other DBMSs store table names case-sensitively when escaping is used which could confuse end-users. Pass null to schemaName to use the default schema

Reimplemented from liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase.

String liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase.getColumnType ( String  columnType,
Boolean  autoIncrement 
)

Returns the database-specific datatype for the given column configuration.

This method will convert some generic column types (e.g. boolean, currency) to the correct type for the current database.

Reimplemented from liquibase.database.AbstractDatabase.
